item.title: Vampire Survivors: The Board Game is heading to Kickstarter
item.content:encoded:
The smash-hit bullet-hell game is making its way from video game land to table top world.

Everyone loves Vampire Survivors, the budget-priced, super moreish bullet-hell game from Poncle. The game has seen various updates and expansions since its initial release in December 2021, and now the game is shedding its digital clothes and heading into the real world thanks to a board game.

Details on Vampire Survivors: The Board Game are almost non-existent, but Poncle has stated that it'll be hitting Kickstarter this autumn (that's Fall for our North American readers). Poncle is working with board game publisher Grey Fox Games, and you can sign up on the official site to receive updates (plus get a free Deck Box with your Kickstarter pledge when it goes live).

Select Your Survivor

  • Choose from beloved characters to battle against creatures of the night.

Face Endless Swarms

  • Wave after wave of familiar enemies relentlessly spawn and threaten your survival.

Unlock and power up weapons and passives

  • Use and evolve signature weapons to cut a path through the darkness in your quest for strength and experience

Fear The Reaper...

  • ...because Red Death comes for us all.

This is a news-in-brief story. This is part of our vision to bring you all the big news as part of a daily live report.
